title: The Chosen of Shar
content:
representing the Gift of Mercy, the Gift of Darkness, and the Gift of Secrets. Go ahead. and interact with the Shadowfell Entrance to begin the next cutscene and introduce the final test. Shadowheart will need to Descend to the Nightsong, Make a sacrifice, and Rise again a Dark Justiciar.

Shadowheart will need to pray. You can respond with:

Shadowheart...? There'll be time to pray later - let's move. [WISDOM] Use the power of the parasite. Feel inside Shadowheart's mind. Leave her to her pray
